item.title: Abyssal Blade
item.param:
+ 70 Damage 
 + 10 Strength 
 BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25% 
 BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10% 
 BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4 
 BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 120 
 OVERWHELM STUN DURATION: 2
item.use:
Active: Overwhelm - Stuns a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity. 
 Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 120 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
item.info: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

item.title: Aghanim's Scepter
item.param:
+ 10 All Attributes 
 + 200 Health 
 + 150 Mana
item.use: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
item.info: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

item.title: Arcane Boots
item.param:
+ 50 Movement Speed 
 + 250 Mana 
 REPLENISH MANA RESTORE: 135 
 REPLENISH CAST RADIUS: 900
item.use: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.
item.info: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

item.title: Armlet of Mordiggian
item.param:
+ 9 Damage 
 + 25 Attack Speed 
 + 5 Armor 
 + 7 HP Regeneration
item.use: Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 40 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
item.info: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

item.title: Assault Cuirass
item.param:
+ 35 Attack Speed 
 + 10 Armor 
 AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20 
 AURA ALLY BONUS ARMOR: 5 
 AURA ENEMY ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
item.use: Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.
item.info: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

item.title: Band of Elvenskin
item.param: + 6 Agility
item.info: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

item.title: Battle Fury
item.param:
+ 55 Damage 
 + 6 HP Regeneration 
 + 150% Mana Regeneration 
 CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35% 
 QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 160% 
 QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 125% 
 CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350 
 CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
item.use:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards. 
 Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan. 
 Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
item.info: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

item.title: Belt of Strength
item.param: + 6 Strength
item.info: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

item.title: Black King Bar

+ 10 Strength 
 + 24 Damage

item.use: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.

item.title: Blade Mail
item.param:
+ 22 Damage 
 + 6 Armor 
 + 10 Intelligence 
 DAMAGE RETURN DURATION: 4.5
item.use: Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.
item.info: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

item.title: Blade of Alacrity
item.param: + 10 Agility
item.info: A long blade imbued with time magic.

item.title: Blades of Attack
item.param: + 9 Damage
item.info: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

item.title: Blink Dagger
item.use: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.
item.info: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

item.title: Bloodstone
item.param:
+ 500 Health 
 + 400 Mana 
 + 9 HP Regeneration 
 + 200% Mana Regeneration
item.use:
Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die. 
 Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 8 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
item.info: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

item.title: Boots of Speed
item.param: + 45 Movement Speed
item.info: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

item.title: Boots of Travel
item.param: + 100 Movement Speed
item.use: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.
item.info: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

item.title: Bracer

+ 6 Strength

 + 3 Damage

item.title: Demon Edge

+ 25/35 Agility 
 + 10/15 Intelligence 
 PURGE SLOW DURATION: 4 
 PURGE CAST RANGE: 600
item.use:
Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs. 
 Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 25 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 12 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
item.info: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

item.title: Divine Rapier
item.param: + 330 Damage
item.use: Drops on death. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
item.info: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

item.use:

Can be cast on self. If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2.0x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.
